name: Healing Beat
storyline: On the planet Carapicia, all life is connected to each other with a musical beat. However, there is an infection taking over the planet. It is up to you, Dr. Lennox, to save the plants. Flow with the rhythm of the music while blasting the infection away.
summary: In Healing Beat, you are challenged to listen and learn the music of the plant, and match your movement to the rhythm.
